title: Fit Model Parameters — fit_devil
text: input_matrix Vector response variable. design_matrix Matrix predictor variables. overdispersion Logical indicating whether estimate overdispersion. offset Offset vector included model. Defaults 0. size_factors Logical indicating whether compute size factors. Defaults TRUE. verbose Logical indicating whether display progress messages. Defaults FALSE. max_iter Maximum number iterations optimization. Defaults 500. eps Tolerance level convergence criterion. Defaults 1e-4.
